data.TITLE: WordPress Fancy Product Designer Plugin: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) Vulnerability (CVE-2025-12570)
data.DIAGNOSIS:
The WordPress Fancy Product Designer plugin allows customers to design and customize any kind of product.

The Fancy Product Designer Plugin is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) via SVG File uploads due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping in the 'data-to-image.php' and 'pdf-to-image.php' files.

Affected Versions:
WordPress Fancy Product Designer Plugin before, and including, 6.4.8

QID Detection Logic:
This QID sends a HTTP GET request and checks for vulnerable version of WordPress Fancy Product Designer Plugin running on the target application.
data.CONSEQUENCE: Successful exploitation of this vulnerability could allow an unauthenticated attacker to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses the SVG file.
data.SOLUTION:
Customers are advised to upgrade to WordPress Fancy Product Designer Plugin 6.5.0 or later version to remediate the vulnerability.

Patch:
Following are links for downloading patches to fix the vulnerabilities:

Fancy Product Designer
